alert.note: Alert for Kittson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 7:35PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Kittson, Benson, Towner, Cavalier, north central Nelson, Ramsey, western Walsh and Pembina Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 734 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Leroy to near Osnabrock to near Fillmore. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Leroy and Osnabrock around 740 PM CDT. Milton around 745 PM CDT. Backoo around 750 PM CDT. Union, Akra and Icelandic State Park around 755 PM CDT. Cavalier around 800 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 205 and 217. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
